title: OxyBridge AI Styling Properties Schema
description: Comprehensive schema defining all supported styling properties for AI-driven page generation with Breakdance/Oxygen builders

unitValue.description: A value with a CSS unit

gradientValue.description: A CSS gradient value (linear, radial, or conic)

position.description: Position for radial/conic gradients (e.g., 'center', '50% 50%', 'at top left')

effects.title: Effects Properties
effects.description: Visual effects including opacity, shadows, filters, and transitions

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Controls element transparency. Value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).

boxShadow.title: Box Shadow
boxShadow.description: CSS box-shadow effect. Accepts standard CSS box-shadow syntax.

boxShadowHover.title: Box Shadow (Hover)
boxShadowHover.description: Box shadow on hover state. Pairs with transitionDuration for smooth effect.

mixBlendMode.title: Mix Blend Mode
mixBlendMode.description: How element blends with background. Uses CSS blend-mode values.

filter.title: CSS Filters
filter.description: Array of filter effects applied to the element. Multiple filters can be combined.

filterBlur.title: Blur Filter
filterBlur.description: Applies Gaussian blur to element. Value in pixels.

filterBrightness.title: Brightness Filter
filterBrightness.description: Adjusts element brightness. 100% is normal, <100% darker, >100% brighter.

filterContrast.title: Contrast Filter
filterContrast.description: Adjusts element contrast. 100% is normal, <100% less contrast, >100% more contrast.

filterGrayscale.title: Grayscale Filter
filterGrayscale.description: Converts element to grayscale. 0% is full color, 100% is fully grayscale.

filterHueRotate.title: Hue Rotate Filter
filterHueRotate.description: Rotates the hue of element colors. Value in degrees (0-360).

filterInvert.title: Invert Filter
filterInvert.description: Inverts element colors. 0% is normal, 100% is fully inverted.

filterSaturate.title: Saturate Filter
filterSaturate.description: Adjusts color saturation. 100% is normal, <100% less saturated, >100% more saturated.

filterSepia.title: Sepia Filter
filterSepia.description: Applies sepia tone effect. 0% is no effect, 100% is fully sepia.

transition.title: Transition
transition.description: Array of CSS transition definitions for smooth property changes.

custom_property.description: Custom CSS property name when property is 'custom'

duration.description: Transition duration in ms or s

transitionDuration.title: Transition Duration
transitionDuration.description: Duration of transition effect. Value in milliseconds (ms) or seconds (s).

transitionTiming.title: Transition Timing Function
transitionTiming.description: Easing function that defines acceleration curve of transition.

transitionProperty.title: Transition Property
transitionProperty.description: Which CSS properties to animate during transition.

transitionCustomProperty.title: Transition Custom Property
transitionCustomProperty.description: Specific CSS property name when transitionProperty is 'custom'.

transitionDelay.title: Transition Delay
transitionDelay.description: Delay before transition starts. Value in milliseconds (ms) or seconds (s).

backgroundGradient.title: Background Gradient
backgroundGradient.description: CSS gradient background. Supports linear, radial, and conic gradients. Can be combined with background colors using background blend modes.

examples.value: radial-gradient(at 40% 20%, #ff6b6b 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 80% 0%, #feca57 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 0% 50%, #48dbfb 0px, transparent 50%)

backgroundGradientHover.title: Background Gradient (Hover)
backgroundGradientHover.description: Gradient background on hover state. Pair with transitionDuration for smooth gradient transitions.

backgroundGradientOverlay.title: Background Gradient Overlay
backgroundGradientOverlay.description: Gradient overlay applied on top of background image. Useful for hero sections with text over images.

backgroundBlendMode.title: Background Blend Mode
backgroundBlendMode.description: How background layers (color, gradient, image) blend together. Different from mixBlendMode which blends the element with content behind it.

examples.description: Multiply gradient over image for darkening
Soft light for subtle color adjustment

backgroundBlendModeHover.title: Background Blend Mode (Hover)
backgroundBlendModeHover.description: Background blend mode on hover state. Create dynamic visual effects on interaction.

examples.description: Change from multiply to normal on hover

textGradient.title: Text Gradient
textGradient.description: Apply gradient fill to text. Creates eye-catching headings and display text. Uses background-clip: text internally.

textGradientHover.title: Text Gradient (Hover)
textGradientHover.description: Text gradient on hover state. Creates interactive text effects.

examples.description: Change to vibrant colors on hover

rotate.title: Rotate
rotate.description: Rotation around X, Y, Z axes. Simplified rotation transform.

rotateX.title: Rotate X
rotateX.description: Rotation around the X axis (horizontal axis). Positive values tilt the top away from viewer.

rotateY.title: Rotate Y
rotateY.description: Rotation around the Y axis (vertical axis). Positive values turn the left side toward viewer.

rotateZ.title: Rotate Z
rotateZ.description: Rotation around the Z axis (perpendicular to screen). Standard 2D rotation.

rotateHover.title: Rotate (Hover)
rotateHover.description: Rotation on hover state. Use with transitionDuration for smooth animation.

rotateYHover.title: Rotate Y (Hover)
rotateYHover.description: Y-axis rotation on hover. Useful for card flip effects.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Uniform scaling factor. 1 is normal size.

scaleX.title: Scale X
scaleX.description: Horizontal scaling factor. Stretch or compress horizontally.

scaleY.title: Scale Y
scaleY.description: Vertical scaling factor. Stretch or compress vertically.

scaleZ.title: Scale Z
scaleZ.description: Z-axis scaling factor for 3D transforms. Only visible with perspective.

scaleHover.title: Scale (Hover)
scaleHover.description: Uniform scaling on hover. Common for button/card interactions.

skewX.title: Skew X
skewX.description: Horizontal skew angle in degrees. Tilts the element along the X axis.

skewY.title: Skew Y
skewY.description: Vertical skew angle in degrees. Tilts the element along the Y axis.

translateX.title: Translate X
translateX.description: Horizontal translation distance. Move element left or right.

translateY.title: Translate Y
translateY.description: Vertical translation distance. Move element up or down.

translateZ.title: Translate Z
translateZ.description: Z-axis translation distance for 3D effects. Moves element toward/away from viewer.

translateXHover.title: Translate X (Hover)
translateXHover.description: Horizontal translation on hover. Create slide effects.

translateYHover.title: Translate Y (Hover)
translateYHover.description: Vertical translation on hover. Create float/lift effects.

translateZHover.title: Translate Z (Hover)
translateZHover.description: Z-axis translation on hover for 3D depth effects

perspective.title: Perspective
perspective.description: Distance from viewer for 3D transforms. Lower values = more dramatic effect.

perspectiveHover.title: Perspective (Hover)
perspectiveHover.description: Perspective distance on hover. Create depth-shifting effects.

transformOrigin.title: Transform Origin
transformOrigin.description: Point around which transforms are applied

transformOriginX.title: Transform Origin X
transformOriginX.description: Custom X position for transform origin (when using 'custom' origin)

transformOriginY.title: Transform Origin Y
transformOriginY.description: Custom Y position for transform origin (when using 'custom' origin)

transformStyle.title: Transform Style
transformStyle.description: How child elements are positioned in 3D space

perspectiveOriginX.title: Perspective Origin X
perspectiveOriginX.description: X position of the vanishing point for 3D perspective

perspectiveOriginY.title: Perspective Origin Y
perspectiveOriginY.description: Y position of the vanishing point for 3D perspective

fadeOnHover.title: Fade on Hover
fadeOnHover.description: Element fades to 70% opacity on hover with smooth transition

cardWithShadow.title: Card with Shadow
cardWithShadow.description: Card element with subtle shadow that elevates on hover

grayscaleToColor.title: Grayscale to Color on Hover
grayscaleToColor.description: Image starts grayscale and reveals color on hover

vintagePhoto.title: Vintage Photo Effect
vintagePhoto.description: Apply sepia and reduced saturation for vintage look

staggeredTransitions.title: Staggered Property Transitions
staggeredTransitions.description: Different properties animate with different timings

flipCard3D.title: 3D Card Flip
flipCard3D.description: Card that flips 180 degrees on hover (requires preserve-3d parent)

subtleFloat.title: Subtle Float Effect
subtleFloat.description: Element appears to float up slightly on hover

spinIcon.title: Spin Icon on Hover
spinIcon.description: Icon rotates 360 degrees on hover (good for refresh/loading icons)

tiltCard3D.title: 3D Tilt Card Effect
tiltCard3D.description: Card tilts slightly in 3D space on hover for depth effect

skewedHeading.title: Skewed Heading Effect
skewedHeading.description: Italic-like skew effect for stylized headings

pressButton.title: Press Button Effect
pressButton.description: Button appears to press down when hovered

combinedTransformHover.title: Combined Transform on Hover
combinedTransformHover.description: Multiple transforms applied together on hover for dramatic effect

gradientBackgroundHover.title: Gradient Background with Hover
gradientBackgroundHover.description: Gradient that shifts direction on hover

heroOverlay.title: Hero Section with Gradient Overlay
heroOverlay.description: Dark gradient overlay for text readability over images

gradientTextHover.title: Interactive Gradient Text
gradientTextHover.description: Text gradient that changes on hover

meshGradient.title: Mesh Gradient Background
meshGradient.description: Modern mesh gradient effect using multiple radial gradients

properties.backgroundGradient: radial-gradient(at 40% 20%, #ff6b6b 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 80% 0%, #feca57 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 0% 50%, #48dbfb 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 80% 80%, #ff6b6b 0px, transparent 50%)

gradientWithBlend.title: Gradient with Blend Mode
gradientWithBlend.description: Gradient combined with blend mode for artistic effect

duotoneEffect.title: Duotone Image Effect
duotoneEffect.description: Create duotone effect using gradient overlay and blend mode

gradientBorderEffect.title: Gradient Card with Border Effect
gradientBorderEffect.description: Card with gradient background and enhanced shadow

glassWithGradient.title: Glassmorphism with Gradient
glassWithGradient.description: Frosted glass effect with subtle gradient background

usageNotes.responsive: Properties marked as 'responsive: true' can have different values per breakpoint using breakpoint_base, breakpoint_tablet_landscape, breakpoint_tablet_portrait, breakpoint_phone_landscape, breakpoint_phone_portrait keys.
usageNotes.cssVariables: Color and unit properties support CSS variables (var(--custom-property)). Use this for theme integration.
usageNotes.transitions: For hover effects to animate smoothly, pair hover properties with transitionDuration and transitionTiming.
usageNotes.filters: Multiple filters can be combined. Each filter type can only be used once per element.
usageNotes.transforms: Multiple transform types can be combined. Order matters - transforms are applied in the order specified.
usageNotes.performance: Heavy use of filters and box-shadows can impact rendering performance. Use sparingly on frequently-animated elements.
usageNotes.gradients: Gradients can be specified as CSS strings or structured objects. Linear gradients use angle or direction, radial gradients use shape and position. Multiple gradients can be layered by comma-separating them. Use CSS variables in gradient color stops for theme consistency.
usageNotes.blendModes: mixBlendMode controls how the element blends with content behind it. backgroundBlendMode controls how background layers (color, gradient, image) blend with each other. Common use cases: multiply for darkening, screen for lightening, overlay for contrast, color for tinting.
usageNotes.textGradients: Text gradients work best on headings and display text. They use background-clip: text internally. Ensure sufficient contrast for accessibility. Gradient text may not be supported in all email clients if used in email templates.
usageNotes.gradientOverlays: Use backgroundGradientOverlay for hero sections with images. A dark gradient (transparent to black) improves text readability. Colored gradients can create brand-consistent overlays.
